scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Adoration of the Magi. The Virgin Mary, dressed in a blue robe, sits holding the Christ Child. Before them kneels one of the Magi, offering a golden vessel. Behind him stand two other Magi, one in a blue and red robe, the other in a red tunic and green hose. They are positioned in an outdoor setting with a thatched shelter on the left, and in the background, a town with spires and towers is visible. A star shines in the blue sky above.
